channel.title: WIP - Minecraft PHP project -
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/b5o8qo.jpg[/img]
[b]Welcome to the official thread for this project, a PHP based game which revolves around minecraft, where you will level up, get weapon's do quests and participate in PVP events! More information will be available soon ![/b]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/dwqro5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/15mk605.png[/img] [u][b]Please note that this game is very early in development and it will be available soon for testing.[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/hx4w86.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2im9sle.png[/img]
[code]09/02/14 - Added Register/Login System 09/02/14 - Added HP/SP System 09/02/14 - Added Armour/Weapon shops 09/02/14 - Added Battle System 10/02/14 - Working on minecraft GUI [/code]

item.title: WIP - Minecraft PHP project -
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

Wait why are you calling this minecraft? Why not just give it your own name with some of MC’s features?

Read full topic

item.title: WIP - Minecraft PHP project -
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:10, topic:539888”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=658738.msg4406990#msg4406990 date=1392310871]

i miss skiyo

Skiyo died mate i did not have any active users on the site after 1 month and i spent 400$ in ADs

I wonder the reason for this…
[/quote]

It may be that it wasn’t anything unique and that the design was basically a bad mockup of twitter.[/quote]

In my opinion it wasn’t the design that made it die, however you are correct it wasn’t unique the market is snagged by ask.fm

Read full topic

item.title: WIP - Minecraft PHP project -
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

Welcome to the official thread for this project, a PHP based game which revolves around minecraft, where you will level up, get weapon’s do quests and participate in PVP events! More information will be available soon !


Please note that this game is very early in development and it will be available soon for testing.

09/02/14 - Added Register/Login System 09/02/14 - Added HP/SP System 09/02/14 - Added Armour/Weapon shops 09/02/14 - Added Battle System 10/02/14 - Working on minecraft GUI
